title: #270 - A 2022 Midsummer Pep Talk
itunes:title: #270 - A 2022 Midsummer Pep Talk
description:
Let’s do a quick little midsummer pep talk for the year of 2022 that just keeps outdoing its big brothers, 2020 and 2021. There are so many things that can impact our day, and right now, it feels like the intensity of the sensory input is extra sharp and edgy. Summer by itself often gives us reason to see things differently.


Helpful Companion Links

  • Episode 219: A Midsummer Pep Talk
  • Episode 230: How to Feel like a Person with Aundi Kolber
  • Details about the Farmer’s Curb Market in Greensboro, where I will be on July 16 from 10-12!
  • Download a transcript of this episode.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
